GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
cifs: Fix oops due to uncleared server->smbd_conn in reconnect

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 5109607a4ece7cd8536172bf7549eb4dce1f3576, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 8ef130f9ec27973f7b49e20c5a3b9134ca33026c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: cifs: Fix oops due to uncleared server->smbd_conn in reconnect
